Articles.Content: pressing F5 quicksaves. pressing it again overwrites the previous quicksave. Alt+F5 lets you choose a custom name, but if you're in the middle of a rocket or airplane flight, pausing the game and taking your hands off the controls (especially if you have a joystick) is not ideal. So a mod to enable multiple quicksaves (quicksave #1, quicksave #2, etc) with only the press of F5 would be great.
This might work: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/105399-0-90-S-A-V-E-automatic-backup-system-0-9-17-387 It'll work with quicksaves too.

There was an old mod that let's you use multiple quicksave and was a very good quicksave manager...

I'm searching it now...
If it's an old mod, it might not even work with 0.90.

the mod I use to backup my SFS file every time I resume my game from the start menu hasn't been updated since 0.23 and still works fine. So there's hope.

Thanks for the effort, MK3424
